house_small.desc: Basic house, perfect for one person.

house.desc: Rather nice house, perfect for you.

house_large.desc: Large house. Not mansion sized yet.

house_weird.desc: This house has 20 bathrooms. 19 of them have toilets. 1 has a urinal.

house_casino.desc: Not a house. but you can live in it. Something inside wants you.

old_rod.desc: Old fishing rod. kinda broken. I would not advice using it.

basic_rod.desc: Basic rod. decent choice for the lake.

effiecent_rod.desc: Great rod. good for fishing at the beach

superior_rod.desc: One of the best rods to wield. I bet you will be catching great fish at the beach

premier_rod.desc: The best rod. His name is Rodney.

map.desc: Its the same map you refused at the beginning of the game.

red_and_white_ball.desc: It's a weird red and white capsule. possibly to contain some weird pocket monster?

golden_idle.desc: It's a golden idle. You aren't sure if you should waste your money on this.

small_tv.desc: Its basically a mobile phone with how small it is.

smelly_rug.desc: It has one stain, It wont leave. Its smell is...Why was this for sell?

loveseat_nice.desc: Thousands of times better then the couch. No holes either.

basic_TV.desc: It comes with all modern streaming services for free!. this has gotta be illegal

nice_rug.desc: Its the same type of rug from before; just clean and new.

pictures.desc: There is three of them. sadly since this world text based you can't see their beauty.

desk.desc: Presumably for a computer you don't have yet.

Amazing_Carpet.desc: Its actually a carpet of snow that doesn't melt, nor get footprints. It's almost solid.

more_pictures.desc: Even more pictures you can't see. just know, they are beautiful.

Gaming_chair.desc: Would fit well with the desk you bought earlier.

Entire_Desktop.desc: Even comes with a monitor, keyboard, and mouse. weird.
